extracted_playbook.title: Enable Automatic Software Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that automatic software updates are enabled to facilitate timely patching of vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Prioritize Patch Implementation
extracted_playbook.description: Prioritize implementing patches for CVEs that are known to be exploited or accessible to a large number of potential attackers, especially for internet-facing systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Citrix ADC Patch for CVE-2019-19781
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the appropriate refresh build according to the vulnerability details outlined by Citrix for CVE-2019-19781.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict VPN Communication to Known IPs
extracted_playbook.description: Only allow the VPN to communicate with known Internet Protocol (IP) addresses (allow-list) to mitigate CVE-2019-19781.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Pulse Secure VPN Patch for CVE-2019-11510
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest Pulse Secure VPN to mitigate CVE-2019-11510.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Fortinet SSL VPN Patch for CVE-2018-13379
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the latest Fortinet SSL VPN to mitigate CVE-2018-13379.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply F5 BIG-IP Patch for CVE-2020-5902
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install a fixed software version of the F5 BIG-IP software to mitigate CVE-2020-5902.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply MobileIron Patch for CVE-2020-15505
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install a fixed software version of MobileIron software to mitigate CVE-2020-15505.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft Exchange Patch for CVE-2020-0688
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install a fixed software version of Microsoft Exchange to mitigate CVE-2020-0688.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Atlassian Confluence Patch for CVE-2019-3396
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install a fixed software version of Atlassian Confluence to mitigate CVE-2019-3396.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft Office Patch for CVE-2017-11882
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy Microsoft's patch for CVE-2017-11882 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Atlassian Crowd Patch for CVE-2019-11580
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Atlassian Crowd to the latest version to mitigate CVE-2019-11580.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Drupal Patch for CVE-2018-7600
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to the most recent version of Drupal core to mitigate CVE-2018-7600.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Telerik UI Patch for CVE-2019-18935
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the most recent version of Telerik UI for ASP.NET AJAX to mitigate CVE-2019-18935.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft SharePoint Patch for CVE-2019-0604
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade on-premise installations of Microsoft SharePoint to the latest available version to mitigate CVE-2019-0604.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Windows BITS Patch for CVE-2020-0787
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the security updates as recommended in the Microsoft BITS security advisory to mitigate CVE-2020-0787.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Microsoft Netlogon Patch for CVE-2020-1472
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the security updates as recommended in the Microsoft Netlogon security advisory to mitigate CVE-2020-1472.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Require multi-factor authentication to remotely access networks from external sources, especially for administrator or privileged accounts.
